impact: Teased upcoming summer collection through social media, generating 500K+ pre-orders and building anticipation for full launch
Ran Easter-themed promotion with pastel color cosmetics and spring dresses, achieving 22% increase in April revenue
Launched partnerships with 50+ fashion influencers globally, expanding brand reach to 5M+ new potential customers
Released complete summer fashion line with 200+ items, became top-selling collection with 45% increase in monthly sales
Curated special Mother's Day gift sets combining fashion and cosmetics, resulted in 60% increase in gift purchases
Opened 15 new flagship stores across Europe and Asia, expanding physical presence and increasing brand accessibility
Implemented AI styling assistant on website and app, improving customer experience and increasing cross-selling by 25%
Launched inclusive Pride collection supporting LGBTQ+ community, generated positive social impact and 30% increase in Gen Z customers
Executed biggest sale event of the year with up to 70% discounts, broke all-time daily sales records and cleared seasonal inventory
Transitioned to 100% biodegradable packaging materials, reduced environmental footprint and attracted eco-conscious customers
Achieved 95% customer satisfaction rating, highest in company history, validating our customer-centric approach and service quality
